ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: When I'm sad, I can usually start doing something that will make me feel better
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: When I'm bored, I fidget or can't sit still
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: I can usually act normal around everybody if I'm upset with someone
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: I am good at keeping track of lots of things going on around me, even when I'm feeling stressed
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: I can start a new task even if I'm already tired
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: Little problems detract me from my long term plans
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: I forget about whatever else I need to do when I'm doing something really fun
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: During a dull class, I have trouble forcing myself to start paying attention
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: After I'm interrupted or distracted, I can easily continue working where I left off
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: If there are other things going on around me, I find it hard to keep my attention focused on whatever I'm doing
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: I never know how much more work I have to do
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: It's hard to start making plans to deal with a big project or problem, especially when I'm feeling stressed
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: I can calm myself down when I'm excited or all wound up
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: If something isn't going according to my plans, I change my actions to try and reach my goal(s)
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: I can find ways to make myself study even when my friends want to go out
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: I lose control whenever I don't get my way
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: If I really want something, I have to have it right away
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: When I have a serious disagreement with someone, I can talk calmly about it without losing control
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: I can stay focused on my work even when it's dull
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: I can stop myself from doing things like throwing objects when I'm mad
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: I work carefully when I know something will be tricky
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: I am usually aware of my feelings before I let them out
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: In class, I can concentrate on my work even if my friends are talking
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: When I'm excited about reaching a goal (e.g., getting my drivers license, going to college), it's easy to start working toward it
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: I can find a way to stick with my plans and goals, even when it's tough
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: When I have a big project, I can keep working on it
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: I can resist doing something when I know I shouldn't do it
Notes: 1= Not at all true for me; 2= Slightly not true for me; 3= Neither untrue or true for me; 4= Slightly true for me; 5= Really true for me

ElementDescription: Adolescent Self-Regulatory Inventory - Subscore of Short-Term Self-Regulation Items
Notes: Sum of asri_1 through asri_12

ElementDescription: Adolescent Self-Regulatory Inventory - Subscore of Long-Term Self-Regulation Items
Notes: Sum of asri_13 through asri_27
